response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a remarkable opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a discounted rate, considering its original valuation stands at $1,500,000.

We understand the importance of making informed decisions and thus provide you with ample time to consider this offer. Kindly let us know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product or our terms.

Please accept this offer within the next 7 days to secure the discounted price. Should you need more time, please inform us so we can accommodate your schedule.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of collaborating with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
